divs: Sighting Detailsi posted a sighting me and my son had on jan 31 earlier today. the reason i am posting this so late is because it was an isolated incedent. now a trusted friend of mine told me this morning that he saw something in the sky in the same place where me and my son saw our event. the strange thing about this is i never told him what this object looked like. he started to describe what he saw and then drew it. i was astonished to see an almost identical drawing of the one my son drew the night we saw our object. i told him to draw and write down as much as he could while it was still fresh in his head. it is remarkable how close these two pictures are. this object was on the same stretch of road that me and my son saw it. i dont know why this object is in the area so much but it seems to be there quite a bit. what is also amazing is we saw this thing hovering over the interstate with numerus lights shining and standing still directly over the interstate and all the cars were passing under it like nothing was there. im puzzled. and dont know who to call or talk to about this as it is the first time ive decided to come forward about this. any help would be appreciated. thank you.
Summary: friend described seeing exact same thing in exact same place on highway
